text: Gerard Marsden MBE (24 September 1942 â€“ 3 January 2021) was an English pop rock singer-songwriter, guitarist and television personality. He was best known for being leader of the Merseybeat band Gerry and the Pacemakers. Marsden died on 3 January 2021 at the age of 78 from a heart infection in Liverpool. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English pop singers Category:English pop musicians Category:English rock guitarists Category:English rock singers Category:English singer- songwriters Category:English television personalities Category:Infectious disease deaths in England Category:Musicians from Liverpool Category:Singers from Liverpool Category:Writers from Liverpool
title: Gerry Marsden
